QuestData.Title: Rolling with my Homies
QuestData.Description: $n, you're about to host the corporate party to end all corporate parties. My research says that if you're seen having a good time at the party, your promotion quotient will skyrocket and explode!$B$BSo, with that in mind, might I suggest that you take your new company hot rod out for a spin?$B$BGo pick up your friends. Just remember me on the way up when it all comes together and you're the new Trade $g Prince : Princess;, okay?
QuestData.LogDescription: Drive the Hot Rod around and pickup your friends: Ace, Gobber, and Izzy.
QuestData.CompletionText: The party's almost ready. How was your trip to town?
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $g sir : ma'am;. You all look very good riding around in the hot rod. I'm sure you made quite an impression on the citizenry.

Objectives.Objective: Keys to the Hot Rod used
